t: Amazon.com: Sega Genesis 1 (Original Model) Console System : Unknown: Video Games
s: It was Chanukah 1991 i was 11 years old. My dad came home with Huge box wrapped in tin foil. When i opened it i was blown away. it was a sega genesis ! i had wanted one so bad because of the 16 bit graphics. i had played on my brothers Atari and his Nes but this was my own console.
